TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UriHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A helper class for constructing encoded Uris for use in headers and other Uris.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string BuildAbsolute (string scheme, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HostString host, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString pathBase = null, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString path = null, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.QueryString query = null, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.FragmentString fragment = null);

.method public static hidebysig string BuildAbsolute(string scheme, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HostString host, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString pathBase, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString path, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.QueryString query, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.FragmentString fragment) cil managed

Docs.param: http, https, etc.
The host portion of the uri normally included in the Host header. This may include the port.
The first portion of the request path associated with application root.
The portion of the request path that identifies the requested resource.
The query, if any.
The fragment, if any.
Docs.summary: Combines the given URI components into a string that is properly encoded for use in HTTP headers. Note that unicode in the HostString will be encoded as punycode.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string BuildRelative (Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString pathBase = null, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString path = null, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.QueryString query = null, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.FragmentString fragment = null);

Docs.param: The first portion of the request path associated with application root.
The portion of the request path that identifies the requested resource.
The query, if any.
The fragment, if any.
Docs.summary: Combines the given URI components into a string that is properly encoded for use in HTTP headers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Encode(class System.Uri uri) cil managed

Docs.param: The Uri to encode.
Docs.summary: Generates a string from the given absolute or relative Uri that is appropriately encoded for use in HTTP headers. Note that a unicode host name will be encoded as punycode.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FromAbsolute (string uri, out string scheme, out Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HostString host, out Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString path, out Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.QueryString query, out Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.FragmentString fragment);

.method public static hidebysig void FromAbsolute(string uri, string scheme, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HostString host, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString path, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.QueryString query, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.FragmentString fragment) cil managed

Docs.param: A string representation of the uri.
http, https, etc.
The host portion of the uri normally included in the Host header. This may include the port.
The portion of the request path that identifies the requested resource.
The query, if any.
The fragment, if any.
Docs.summary: Separates the given absolute URI string into components. Assumes no PathBase.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetDisplayUrl (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest request);
.method public static hidebysig string GetDisplayUrl(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest request) cil managed

Docs.param: The request to assemble the uri pieces from.
Docs.summary: Returns the combined components of the request URL in a fully un-escaped form (except for the QueryString) suitable only for display. This format should not be used in HTTP headers or other HTTP operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetEncodedPathAndQuery (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest request);
.method public static hidebysig string GetEncodedPathAndQuery(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest request) cil managed

Docs.param: The request to assemble the uri pieces from.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetEncodedUrl (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest request);
.method public static hidebysig string GetEncodedUrl(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest request) cil managed

Docs.param: The request to assemble the uri pieces from.
Docs.summary: Returns the combined components of the request URL in a fully escaped form suitable for use in HTTP headers and other HTTP operations.
